footer.portalDescription: Leading platform providing professional ECU tuning software and services.

hero.title: ECU Tuning Portal
hero.subtitle: Professional Chip Tuning Solutions
hero.description: Welcome to ECU Tuning Portal, offering the most comprehensive service in the sector with 16 years of professional experience.
hero.experienceText: Easily manage all your business processes with this professional portal developed with our 10+ years of experience in the car tuning ecosystem.

features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: As a professional tuning file service portal, ECU Tuning Portal offers the most comprehensive service in the sector with 16 years of professional experience.

testimonials.title: Customer Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Check out what our customers say about the ECU Tuning Portal

statistics.title: ECU Tuning Portal in Numbers
statistics.subtitle: Our achievements with 16 years of experience in the industry

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Start enjoying the benefits of ECU Tuning Portal right away
cta.join: Join +2,500 satisfied customers and start managing your tuning business more efficiently today.

brands.title: Trusted by the best automotive brands

professionals.title: Designed for Professional Masters
professionals.description: This portal was designed after many intensive meetings with our clients. It was especially designed for professionals who provide tuning services in the market. After constantly exchanging ideas with our clients, we designed a user-friendly portal without any unnecessary features.

international.title: Work Internationally with 16 Different Languages
international.description: We know that the tuning industry operates globally, so our portal supports 16 different languages to help you reach clients worldwide.
international.label: Multilanguage Support

customer_management.title: Customer Management System
customer_management.description: Easily manage your customers, store contact information, and track order history.

credits_system.title: Advanced Credits System
credits_system.description: Provide fast and easy service to your customers with a prepaid credit system.

ecu_credits.title: ECU Credits & Sales System
ecu_credits.description: Manage ECU credits, track sales, and view revenue reports.

file_tracking.title: File Tracking System
file_tracking.description: Easily track, organize, and archive all your files.

language_support.title: 16 Different Language Support
language_support.description: Serve your international customers in their own languages.

payment_methods.title: 5 Different Payment Methods
payment_methods.description: Accept payments via credit card, bank transfer, PayPal, and more.

billing_system.title: Advanced Billing System
billing_system.description: Simplify your accounting processes with automatic invoice creation and sending features.

vehicle_database.title: 12,659 Vehicle Database
vehicle_database.description: Serve all makes and models with an extensive vehicle database.

support_system.title: Support Request System
support_system.description: Manage customer support requests and provide quick solutions.

notifications.title: Cloud and SMS Notifications
notifications.description: Automatically inform your customers about transaction statuses.

discount_system.title: Customer Discount System
discount_system.description: Offer discounts to your special customers and create loyalty programs.

more.title: And more...
more.description: ECU Tuning Portal offers all the features you need and more.
